summary.name: Amazon Echo (5th Gen)
summary.description: Amazon Echo Dot is a voice controlled smart speaker system for yourn home that comes with the AI assistance called Alexa. You can ask Alexa for news, general information, music and more.

overview.name: AZ2 processor
overview.description: This processor is an updated version of the Amazon Neural Edge processor.

location.address: 11501 Alterra Pkwy, Austin, TX 78758 Austin, Texas

overview.name: SK Hynix H54926AY 0.5 GB model
overview.description: This RAM has a speed of 4266 mbps located under a metal shield.

overview.name: MediaTek Wifi/ Bluetooth controller
overview.description: Located below the the CPU and RAM whihc outputs tow PCB antennas, one on each side of the board

location.address: No.1, Dusing 1st Rd., Hsinchu Science Park, Hsinchu, 30078, Hsinchu, Taiwan

overview.name: TLV320ADC5140 Texas Instruments Quad-channel 768-kHz Burr-Brownâ„¢
overview.description: This audio analogue to digital converter in the Echo dot uses the three microphones to locate the direction the voice is coming from and filter out background noise.

location.address: Texas Instruments, Inc. 12500 TI Blvd. M/S 8656 Dallas, TX 75243

overview.name: MAX98396EWB Digital Input Class-DG Amplifier
overview.description: Digital Input Class-DG Amplifier with an output power of 20W into 8 ohms or 19W into 4 ohms, driving the internal speaker.

location.address: 160 Rio Robles San Jose,CA  95134, UNITED STATES

overview.name: Main PCB
overview.description: The main PCB is located on top fo the speaker when you open the case. It has RGB LED's around the edge of it on one side.

overview.name: Upper Switch PCB
overview.description: The small round PCB, which is screwed into the top of the case, contains four buttons, two LEDs, and a light sensor on the upper side with a soft rubber gasket

overview.name: Top Cover
overview.description: This is the top of the Amazon echo dot smart speaker with four buttons. The + and - buttons control the volume, the cricle button activates Alexa, and the circle with a line through it enables or diables the microphones.

overview.name: Bottom Cover
overview.description: The lower half of the case when opned up has an LED diffuser ring lining the inside of it.
